name: Santok
description:
The Game

A quick Unreal game jam before Christmas !

You are Santa Claus, trying to deliver the Christmas gifts as usual. Only this year is different : young TikTokers found you on the streets and are getting in your way !

Deliver as many gifts as you can before they ruin your sleigh !


The Team

Yoan AGOSTINI - Game Artist

Cédric CHAUVIN - Game Programmer

Victor CHIOREAN - Producer

Juliette GUILLAUMEL - Game Artist

François DESSARTS - Game Artist

Leopold HILLION - Game Programmer

Tom LENAERTS - Game / Sound Designer

Malik SADEQ - Game Designer

Clément TISSERAND - Game Designer

Marie WAJSBLAT - Game / Sound Designer
